Text:
Great team effort Mr. & Mrs. Have been an avid follower now for a good number of years. Looking forward to more of the same in 2011! 
Happy New Year to the Shanklys and TPB.

goodness me...I thought you'd stopped uploading...

You don't know how happy I am to bump into this torrent...

You never mentioned in any of SLC2009 torrents you had changed your name...How cruel...

Anyway I'm just kidding...

i wish you a Happy new year and thank you for your wonderful work...
Welcome back Phoenix-III - the name changte was due to computer problems, but any search of "Shankly" will catch you up on what you missed!

Hey Shankly, thanks for all the great work!  I've been following your stuff since 2006 and I love it. :)

Also, I recently had a huge hard drive failure and I'm trying to re-download all of your mixes.

I've got everything from 2006, 2008, 2009 and 2010, but I can't find anything except the "Best Of" from *2007*.  Could you re-up your monthly mixes from 2007?  (Maybe in one big archive?)

Thanks!
